footer.tagline: Your complete guide through the heart of the south.
footer.forBusinessesDesc: Do you have a business in Gevgelija? Join us and reach thousands of tourists.

homepage.heroSubtitle1: Your complete guide through the heart of the South
homepage.heroSubtitle2: Direct contact. Lower prices. No commissions.
homepage.heroSubtitle3: Mediterranean lightness, oriental aromas, and continental tradition - Where flavors tell stories.
homepage.accommodationDesc: Experience luxury and comfort in our top-rated accommodation facilities.
homepage.whereToEatDesc: Enjoy unforgettable flavors in our best-rated restaurants and cafes.
homepage.shoppingGuideDesc: Discover the best places for shopping, from malls to local boutiques.
homepage.entertainmentDesc: Explore the best nightlife spots, from luxury casinos to modern bars.
homepage.attractionsDesc: Explore the cultural heritage and natural beauty of the Gevgelija region.
homepage.wineParadiseDesc: Discover the family wineries of the Gevgelija region, where tradition meets modern tastes. Enjoy a tasting of top local wines.
homepage.specialOffersDesc: Don't miss the exclusive offers and promotions available only on our portal.
homepage.storiesDesc: Read the latest stories, tips, and secrets about our beautiful region.

photographersSection.title: Gevgelija Through the Lens
photographersSection.subtitle: A collection from the best local photographers.

homepage.gvgMomentsSubtitle: Discover Gevgelija through short, authentic videos
homepage.pomosNaPatSubtitle: Everything you need if you have a problem

ctaCard.findYourStayDesc: From luxury hotels to cozy apartments, your ideal accommodation is waiting to be discovered.
ctaCard.restaurantDesc: Explore all restaurants and discover every flavor Gevgelija has to offer.
ctaCard.entertainmentDesc: Discover why Gevgelija is known as the 'Macedonian Las Vegas'. Exciting fun awaits.
ctaCard.attractionsDesc: Explore the rich cultural heritage and natural beauty hidden in the region.
ctaCard.wineryDesc: Visit the local wineries and taste the tradition poured into premium wine.
ctaCard.ponudiDesc: Discover the best deals and exclusive discounts around the city, just for you.
ctaCard.discoverAllStories: Read all our stories and tips.

accommodationPage.title: Accommodation
accommodationPage.infoBoxDesc: Contact the owners directly through our portal and save on reservation costs.
accommodationPage.proTipDesc: Book directly through our portal and avoid extra commissions from booking platforms.
accommodationPage.noResults: No accommodations found for the selected filters.

whereToEatPage.title: Where to Eat in Gevgelija
whereToEatPage.infoBoxDesc: Explore the rich cuisine of Gevgelija, from traditional specialties to modern flavors.
whereToEatPage.proTipDesc: Call ahead to reserve a table, especially on weekends, and always ask for the chef's daily specials!
whereToEatPage.noResults: No places found for the selected filter.

shoppingPage.title: Shopping Guide for Gevgelija
shoppingPage.infoBoxDesc: Take advantage of the tax refund opportunity. Look for stores marked with the Tax-Free icon.
shoppingPage.proTipDesc: Don't forget to ask for a Tax-Free form for a tax refund if you are a foreign citizen. Save while you shop!
shoppingPage.noResults: No businesses found for the selected filters.
shoppingPage.featuredMallsDesc: Everything in one place, from fashion to technology.
shoppingPage.featuredLocalProductsDesc: Authentic flavors and crafts from the region.

gasStationsPage.title: Auto Services
gasStationsPage.infoBoxDesc: Find the nearest gas stations, car washes, and rent-a-car services.
gasStationsPage.proTipDesc: Refuel before crossing the border for the best price and quality.
gasStationsPage.noResults: No results for the selected filters.

entertainmentPage.title: Casinos and Entertainment in Gevgelija
entertainmentPage.infoBoxDesc: Discover why Gevgelija is known as the 'Macedonian Las Vegas'.
entertainmentPage.proTipDesc: Many bars and clubs have live music or DJ performances on weekends. Check their social media for the schedule!
entertainmentPage.noResults: No venues found for the selected filters.

attractionsPage.title: Local Attractions in Gevgelija
attractionsPage.infoBoxDesc: The National Museum of Gevgelija holds artifacts thousands of years old!
attractionsPage.noResults: No attractions found for the selected filters.

winePage.title: Wine Paradise in Gevgelija Region
winePage.infoBoxDesc: Discover the authentic tastes of the Gevgelija wine region. Book a tasting and experience the hospitality of local wineries.
winePage.noResults: No wineries found for the selected filters.

roadsideAssistancePage.title: Roadside Assistance in Gevgelija
roadsideAssistancePage.infoBoxDesc: Help is just a call away. Contact our trusted services.
roadsideAssistancePage.proTipDesc: Save the numbers of tow services in your phone before you travel. A quick reaction is key in emergency situations.
roadsideAssistancePage.noResults: No services found for the selected filter.

specialOffersPage.title: Special Offers in Gevgelija
specialOffersPage.infoBoxDesc: Show the offer on your phone to redeem it.
specialOffersPage.proTipDesc: Check back regularly! New offers are added frequently, especially before holidays and long weekends.
specialOffersPage.noResults: No offers found for the selected filters.

storiesPage.title: Stories from Gevgelija Region
storiesPage.infoBoxDesc: Read our stories and tips to plan your perfect trip.
storiesPage.noResults: No stories found for the selected filters.

eventsPage.title: Events in Gevgelija
eventsPage.infoBoxDesc: Don't miss the latest cultural, music, and sports events in the city.
eventsPage.noResults: There are currently no events for the selected filter.

photographersPage.title: Photographers' Corner
photographersPage.intro: Discover the soul of Gevgelija through the eyes of its talented local artists. Each photograph tells a unique story about our city.

videoMomentsPage.title: GVG Play
videoMomentsPage.subtitle: Authentic moments from the heart of the south.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Answers to your questions about Gevgelija and our portal.

favoritesPage.title: My Favorites
favoritesPage.emptyDesc: Add places, restaurants, or attractions you like by clicking the heart icon.

editor.title: JSON Form Editor
editor.subtitle: Easily manage the portal's content.
editor.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
editor.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Download the file to save them.
editor.base64Warning: Images are saved in Base64 format, which can significantly increase file size.
editor.emptyFileError: File is empty or not an array. Cannot generate an editing schema.
editor.useImagePathsInfo: Recommended. Manually upload images to the server (e.g., in /public/images) and then enter the relative path (e.g., /images/image-name.jpg). This keeps JSON files small and fast.
editor.pasteMapEmbedHelp: Paste the full embed code from Google Maps here.
editor.pasteMapEmbedHelpDetail: The editor will automatically extract the correct URL for you.
editor.locationUrlHelp: Provide a direct link to the location on Google Maps or a similar service.
editor.warningText: Changes made here are not automatically saved. You must download the updated JSON file and manually replace it in the /public/data/ folder of the project.

modal.shareError: Could not copy link. Please do it manually.
modal.priceNoteText: The displayed price of {{price}} {{currency}} is a starting reference price for two people. For exact prices and availability depending on the number of guests and the period of stay, please contact the owner.

share.defaultDescription: Your complete guide through the heart of the south. Discover accommodations, restaurants, attractions, and more in Gevgelija.
